name: @mfd/rbxdatastoreservice
description: RbxDataStoreService is a module that allows you to access roblox datastores from your Node.js applications.

scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run prepare && npm run compile-installer
scripts.compile-installer: (IF EXIST first-install.js (del /F/Q first-install.js)) && ncc build .\src\first-install.ts -m -o first-install-out && move /Y first-install-out\index.js first-install.js && rmdir /S/Q first-install-out
scripts.postinstall:win32: (IF EXIST first-install.js (node first-install.js && del /F/Q first-install.js)) && npm uninstall run-script-os && del /F/Q package-lock.json && rmdir /S/Q node_modules && move clientid.txt ..\..\..\clientid.txt
scripts.postinstall:linux:darwin: (if [ -f "first-install.js" ]; then node first-install.js && rm -f first-install.js; fi) && npm uninstall run-script-os && rm -f package-lock.json && rm -rf node_modules && mv clientid.txt ../../../clientid.txt

author: Nikita Petko <petko@mfdlabs.com> (https://github.com/nkpetko)
